title: Большая перемена
overview:
Nestor Petrovich Severov, a student preparing to start his PhD in 
Russian history, has his ego bruised by his girl-friend, who beats him 
on their entrance exam. He starts working at a night school,
 having had his spot at a graduate program taken away by the young 
woman. He soon finds out that teaching adults can be very hard, 
especially when they aren't willing to learn.
